Scripts.OnClick: SheepMod.ClickMainCheckButton(); if SheepModOptions[Realm][Player].MCed == true then SheepModOptions[Realm][Player].MCed = "All valid players" end SheepModOptions[Realm][Player].MCName = "" SM_SetMCName:SetText(sm_string_set_player) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(sm_button_mc);
